server.name: soar
server.description: APTL SOAR MCP Server - Provides AI agents with access to Shuffle SOAR for automated response playbooks, containment actions, and orchestration workflows.

list_workflows.description: List all available SOAR workflows/playbooks. Returns workflow names, triggers, and status.

execute_workflow.description: Execute a SOAR workflow/playbook. Pass execution arguments in body. Example: {"params": {"workflow_id": "abc-123"}, "body": {"execution_argument": {"alert_id": "wazuh-12345", "src_ip": "172.20.4.30"}}}

get_execution.description: Get the status and results of a workflow execution. Example: {"params": {"workflow_id": "abc-123", "execution_id": "exec-456"}}

list_executions.description: List recent executions of a workflow. Shows status, timing, and results. Example: {"params": {"workflow_id": "abc-123"}}
